# OVOS TTS Plugin AhoTTS

## Description

OVOS TTS plugin for [AhoTTS](https://github.com/aholab/AhoTTS)

## Install

`pip install ovos-tts-plugin-ahotts`


## Configuration

```json
  "tts": {
    "module": "ovos-tts-plugin-ahotts",
    "ovos-tts-plugin-ahotts": {
        "lang": "eu"
    }
  }
```
